html.head:
<!--[if lt IE 9]>
	  
    <![endif]-->
    
    
    
      
/* Variable definitions
====================
*/
/* Content
==================== */
body {
font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
color: #333;
background: white;
padding: 0;
font-size: 150%;
}
html body {
min-width: 0;
max-width: 100%;
width: 100%;
}
h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
font-family : Signika,sans-serif;
}
h1 {
font-size: 3em;
}
h2 {
font-size: 2.5em;
}
h3 {
font-size: 2em;
}
h4 {
font-size: 1.5em;
}
h5, h6 {
font-size: 1em;
}
a:link {
text-decoration:none;
color: #333;
transition: color 0.4s ease 0s;
}
a:visited {
text-decoration:none;
}
a:hover {
text-decoration:underline;
}
* { 
-webkit-border-radius: 0 !important;
-moz-border-radius: 0 !important;
border-radius: 0 !important;
}
.PageList .nav-tabs {
border-bottom : 0px solid transparent;
}
.centered {
float: none;
margin: 0 auto;
}
.post {
border : 2px solid #999;
}
.jump-link:link {
padding: 0.5em;
background: #F5F059;
background: rgba(242, 236, 48, 0.8);
display: inline-block;
text-align : center;
margin-left: auto;
margin-right: auto;
color: #FFF;
min-width: 6em;
}
.jump-link:hover{
text-decoration : none;
color: #999999;
}
.post-footer-line {
padding: 0.5em;
}
.white-fader{
/* Permalink - use to edit and share this gradient: http://colorzilla.com/gradient-editor/#ffffff+0,ffffff+100&0+0,1+100 */
/* IE9 SVG, needs conditional override of 'filter' to 'none' */
background: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,);
background: -moz-linear-gradient(top,  rgba(255,255,255,0) 0%, rgba(255,255,255,1) 100%); /* FF3.6+ */
background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%,rgba(255,255,255,0)), color-stop(100%,rgba(255,255,255,1))); /* Chrome,Safari4+ */
background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top,  rgba(255,255,255,0) 0%,rgba(255,255,255,1) 100%); /* Chrome10+,Safari5.1+ */
background: -o-linear-gradient(top,  rgba(255,255,255,0) 0%,rgba(255,255,255,1) 100%); /* Opera 11.10+ */
background: -ms-linear-gradient(top,  rgba(255,255,255,0) 0%,rgba(255,255,255,1) 100%); /* IE10+ */
background: linear-gradient(to bottom,  rgba(255,255,255,0) 0%,rgba(255,255,255,1) 100%); /* W3C */
filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#00ffffff', endColorstr='#ffffff',GradientType=0 ); /* IE6-8 */
}
.dropdown-menu > li > a.sb-twitter:hover {
color: #55ACEE;
}
.dropdown-menu > li > a.sb-facebook:hover {
color: #3b5998;
}
.dropdown-menu > li > a.sb-printerest:hover {
color: #D01E15;
}
.popular-posts ul li {
list-style: none;
}

    
    
      
      
      
      
      
/* Bootstrap column overwrite */
.container-main-block {
max-width: $(content.width);
}
.col-main, .col-right {
position: relative;
min-height: 1px;
padding-right: 15px;
padding-left: 15px;
}
/* layout style */
#layout .col-main, #layout .col-right {
float: left;
padding-right: 15px;
padding-left: 15px;
}
#layout .col-right {
width : 22.44%;
}
#layout .col-main {
width : 77.55%	
}
#layout .row {
}
#layout .row::before {
display: table;
content: " ";
}
#layout .row::after {
clear: both;
content: " ";
}
@media screen and (min-width: $(main.breaking.point)) {
.col-main, .col-right {
float: left;
}
.col-right {
width : 22.44%;
}
.col-main {
width : 77.55%	
}
}
/* Dimension and sizes */
/* Post */ 
.post {
margin-bottom: 1.2em;
padding: 2em;
position: relative;
}
.post-footer {
clear: both;
}
.post-body {
width: auto; 
}
.has-post-image img:first-child {
display: none;
}
.thumb-size-wrap > img {
width: 100%;
height: auto;
}
.thumb-size-wrap {
width: 33%;
float: left;
margin: 0.2em 1.2em 0.2em -0em;
}
.post-spacer {
display: block;
width: 100%;
padding-bottom : 2.5em;
}
.post-links {
margin-top: -3em;
height: 3em;
position: relative;
padding-left: 0.8em;
}
.post-body {
display: inline;
}
.has-post-image  .separator {
clear: none !important;
}
.post-text-trimmer-disabled .post-text-smoth-trimmer-bg{
position: absolute;
bottom: 0;
width: 100%;
height: 3em;
}
.post-thumb-wrap {
width: 300px;
float: left;
height: 100%;
}
.post-thumb {
width: 100%;
margin : 5px;
}
.post:hover .post-icons {
display : block;
}
.post-icons {
position: absolute;
right: 10px;
bottom: 10px;
display: none;
font-size: 200%;
}
.post-body * {
max-width: 100%;
}
.share-button-link-text  {
text-indent: 0;
display: inline;
margin-left: 0.5em;
}
.post-options-dropdown {
position: absolute; 
right: 0px; 
top: 0px;
font-size: 200%;
}
.post-options-dropdown > button {
border : 0px;
background: transparent;
}
.status-msg-wrap {
width : 100%;
}
.widget ul {
padding : 0 0 0 0;
}
.col-right .widget h2 {
font-size: 1.2em;
width: 100%;
border-bottom: 2px solid #999;
padding-bottom: 1em;
}
.section {
margin: 0px 0px;
}

.post-footer-line-2  {
  width : 80%;
  margin-left: -15px;
  margin-right: -15px;
  text-align : center;
  line-height: 0;
  white-space: nowrap;
  
}
.post-footer-line-2 > .share-bubble {
  display: inline;

}

    
    
    
    
    
    <!--[if gte IE 9]>
    
    <![endif]-->

b:widget.title: Navbar

div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "_height: " + data:height + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "
